metadata.description: A curated plugin marketplace for Claude Code containing development tools and productivity plugins specifically designed for FlowAccount developers.

plugins.name: ask-before-code
plugins.description: Encourages clarity before coding to prevent wasted work. Ask 3 questions now, save 3 hours later.

plugins.name: quick-wins
plugins.description: Identifies and guides easy code improvements. Small improvements, big impact.

plugins.name: md-to-skill
plugins.description: Convert LLM-generated markdown files into organized Claude skills with automatic structure analysis, quality validation, and intelligent content merging.
